title: Why CBD with Marty Sumichrast and Caryn Dunayer, cbdMD
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Marty Sumichrast is Chairman and CEO and Caryn Dunayer Co-founder and President of cbdMD, the first American NYSE traded CBD company. They join Rena Sherbill to talk about the fortuitous timing of pivoting from Level Brands into YCBD and how bad actors affect consistent implementation of the Farm Bill. They also discuss branching out into pet CBD products, major sponsorship deals and the drawbacks of great growth. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

They join Rena Sherbill to talk about the fortuitous timing of pivoting from Level Brands into YCBD and how bad actors affect consistent implementation of the Farm Bill.
